title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.3 - Assignment of powers and duties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.3 - Assignment of powers and duties

State Regulations

The chancellor may assign to the officers, faculty and
staff of the university powers, duties and responsibilities, and they shall be
responsible to the chancellor and the board of trustees for the performance
thereof, as well as for those powers, duties and responsibilities specifically
vested in them by these policies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
328.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
